title: Mech Behavior-Composites
description: Stress-strain behavior of composites, property of matrix and reinforcing materials, mechanics of fiber-reinforced composites, lamina and laminate analysis, and mechanical performance. Crosslisted with AE, CEE, ME, MSE, and PTFE 4791.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ME 3201 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
